welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dinapore, India! Get ready to experience the rich history, vibrant culture, and beautiful landscapes that this charming city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Dinapore has to offer.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Patna Airport serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
